questions.explanation:
Cassie.

	Cassie likes animals and Rachel likes shopping.

Marco.

	Marco is funny and Jake usually isn't.

Jake and Marco.

	Tobias met Jake and Marco at the video arcade.

questions.text: What is Ax's favorite human food?
questions.explanation:
cinnamon buns.

	Ax likes saying the words "cinnamon buns."

questions.text: What morph did Tobias try FIRST?
questions.explanation:
cat.

	Tobias morphed his cat Dude.

Visser Three.

	Visser Three can morph into anything.

questions.text: What was the FIRST morph that David tried?
questions.explanation:
eagle.

	David was the newest Animorph in the book "The Discovery."
